Reviews.Title: Awesome seller
Reviews.Author: Sharon Zart
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a laptop to replace my very old one. What I got was a Dell Laptop that is like brand new. I absolutely would say this seller is top notch.

ProductInfo.Features:
Loaded with Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2 GHz Processor
Genuine license of Windows 7 Home Premium
Equipped with 4GB of DDR2 memory-- Expandable to 8 gigabytes of Ram
Installed with a 160GB Hard Drive and a DVD-ROM optical drive
Refurbished by a Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher. Buy in confidence from Blair Technology Group
ProductInfo.Name: Dell E6400 Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz- 4GB Memory- 160GB HD- WiFi- Windows 7 Home
